mapping_info.scope: High-risk AI systems in healthcare, conformity assessments

mappings.haarf_description: Three-factor risk assessment (clinical function, autonomy, data sensitivity)
mappings.notes: EU AI Act requires risk classification - HAARF three-factor approach directly supports high-risk determination
mappings.compliance_evidence: Risk classification documentation demonstrating healthcare AI agent meets high-risk criteria under Annex III

mappings.notes: Direct implementation of EU AI Act post-market monitoring requirements for healthcare AI
mappings.compliance_evidence: Post-market monitoring system, incident reporting procedures, and performance tracking documentation

mappings.haarf_description: Complete data lineage and provenance tracking
mappings.notes: EU AI Act data governance requirements fully addressed by HAARF data lineage tracking
mappings.compliance_evidence: Data governance documentation, training data quality assurance, and bias monitoring systems

mappings.haarf_description: Explainable AI with clinically meaningful insights
mappings.notes: EU transparency requirements for high-risk AI systems directly supported by HAARF XAI
mappings.compliance_evidence: AI system transparency documentation, user information provisions, and explainability validation

mappings.notes: EU robustness requirements enhanced by HAARF healthcare-specific adversarial testing
mappings.compliance_evidence: Robustness testing protocols, adversarial attack resistance validation, cybersecurity assessment

mappings.haarf_description: Clinical accountability frameworks for healthcare professionals
mappings.notes: EU human oversight requirements directly implemented through HAARF clinical accountability
mappings.compliance_evidence: Human oversight procedures, clinical professional competency requirements, override capabilities

mappings.haarf_description: Training data representativeness and demographic parity
mappings.notes: EU data quality and bias prevention requirements enhanced by HAARF population equity measures
mappings.compliance_evidence: Training data diversity analysis, demographic representation validation, bias mitigation strategies

mappings.haarf_description: Role-based tool access controls for healthcare AI agents
mappings.notes: EU risk management covers general system risks - HAARF C8 adds specific tool integration controls
mappings.compliance_evidence: Tool access control matrix, integration risk assessment, clinical appropriateness validation

mappings.haarf_description: Medical device integration maintaining classification integrity
mappings.notes: Tool integration with EU MDR devices requires careful classification management under both AI Act and MDR
mappings.compliance_evidence: MDR compliance for integrated devices, classification impact analysis, CE marking validation

conformity_assessment_module_a.notes: Internal conformity assessment supported by comprehensive HAARF verification

conformity_assessment_module_b.notes: Third-party assessment requires highest level of HAARF verification evidence

ce_marking.notes: CE marking requires demonstrated compliance across all relevant HAARF categories

required_documentation: EU AI Act conformity assessment documentation
Data governance and quality assurance procedures
Risk management system including tool integration risks
Instructions for use and user information
